heading: ABOUT ME
paragraphs: Hi, I'm Primaâ€”a passionate and detail-oriented web developer with a strong foundation in modern web technologies. I specialize in building responsive, accessible, and user-friendly applications using React, TypeScript, Node.js, and Express. Through hands-on experience and personal projects, I've developed skills in full-stack development, RESTful API design, and UI/UX design. I'm always eager to learn, solve real-world problems through code, and contribute to meaningful digital experiences. Whether it's backend logic or frontend interfaces, I love turning ideas into clean, functional products
